name: Linli Xu
content: Linli Xu's USTC Homepage Linli Xu Home Publications Bio Links Professor School of Computer Science and Technology University of Science and Technology of China Research Interests: My research area is Machine Learning. More specifically, my work combines aspects from the following: Weakly-supervised learning Neural methods and applications: Natural Language Processing, Multimodal Learning Multi-task learning and transfer learning Optimization Contact: Mailing Address: School of Computer Science and Technology University of Science and Technology of China Hefei, Anhui, China 230027 Email:
